attributes.action: Stop Scientology from trading as a 'Church' in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We demand that the company trading as 'The Church of Scientology' be made to change its misleading name by the Secretary of State under Section 32 of the Companies Act.
The current trading name misleads the public into believing that this company is an offical religious organisation and would lead to individuals paying large amounts of money to join.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
